#summary pyPassport API 1.0 installation instructions on windows Vista
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= 1. Python =

[http://python.org/download/releases/2.6.2/ Install python 2.6]

Add the python directory to the path variable displayed in the Environment Variable panel (Windows Control Panel > System > Advanced > Environment Variables).

= 2. Dependances =

= 2.1 Mandatory =

The dependances listed bellow are mandatory to use the basic functionalities of the API.

=== 2.1.1 Setup tool ===

 # [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptools Download setuptools sources]
 # Unzip it
 # cd setuptools-x.x
 # python setup.py install

=== 2.1.2 pyCrypto ===

 # [http://www.voidspace.org.uk/python/modules.shtml#pycrypto Download pycrypto-2.0.1.win32-py2.6.exe]
 # Install it

=== 2.1.3 pyasn1 ===
 # [http://sourceforge.net/projects/pyasn1/files/ Download pyasn1 sources]
 # Unzip it
 # cd pyasn1-x.x.x
 # python setup.py install

=== 2.1.4 pyscard ===

 # [http://sourceforge.net/projects/pyscard/files/ Download pyscard-1.6.8.win32-py2.6.msi]
 # Install it

== 2.2 Highly recommended ==

The dependance listed bellow is mandatory to perform the Passive Authentication

=== 2.2.1 OpenSSL ===


= 3. pyPassport installation =

 # [http://pypassport.googlecode.com/files/pypassport-1.0.zip Download pyPassport 1.0]
 # Unzip it
 # cd pypassport-1.0
 # python setup.py install
